author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Delta R22000 shower valve tips…I’m using this valve because it has an integrated diverter for a handheld shower wand. The 2x10 has to be set to the correct depth and be plumb. That way, the valve trim will seal properly against the tile shower wall and stop water from getting inside the stud bay 🔥#plumbing #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Delta R22000 Shower Valve Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
